name: Gerald TEDESCO, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellee. H. Wayne Weinstein and Hartley C. King, Intervenors

ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
